name: nmap
description: A powerful network scanning tool for host discovery, port scanning, OS detection, and service versioning.

name: whois
description: A utility to look up registration information for a domain name or IP address.

name: gobuster
description: A tool for brute-forcing directories and files on web servers to find hidden content.

name: sqlmap
description: An automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool.

name: hydra
description: A parallelized network logon cracker which supports numerous protocols to attack.

name: nikto
description: A web server scanner which performs comprehensive tests for vulnerabilities.

name: feroxbuster
description: A fast, simple, recursive content discovery tool written in Rust.

name: wpscan
description: A black box WordPress security scanner.

name: searchsploit
description: A command-line search tool for the Exploit-DB database.

name: msfvenom
description: A payload generator that is part of the Metasploit Framework.

name: dig
description: A flexible tool for interrogating DNS name servers and performing DNS lookups.

name: nslookup
description: A network administration command-line tool for querying DNS to obtain domain records.

name: curl
description: A command-line tool for transferring data from or to servers using various protocols.

name: wget
description: A free utility for non-interactive download of files from the Web.

name: netcat
description: A networking utility for reading from and writing to network connections using TCP or UDP.

name: masscan
description: An Internet-scale port scanner that can scan the entire Internet in under 5 minutes.

name: rustscan
description: A modern, fast port scanner that finds open ports quickly and feeds them to nmap.

name: dirb
description: A web content scanner that looks for existing directories and files.

name: dirbuster
description: A multi-threaded application designed to brute force directories and files on web servers.

name: ffuf
description: Fast web fuzzer written in Go for discovering web content and parameters.

name: enum4linux
description: A tool for enumerating information from Windows and Samba systems.

name: smbclient
description: A client that can access SMB/CIFS resources on servers.

name: nbtscan
description: A program for scanning IP networks for NetBIOS name information.

name: snmpwalk
description: An SNMP application that uses SNMP GETNEXT requests to query a network entity.

name: john
description: John the Ripper password cracker for various password hash types.

name: hashcat
description: Advanced password recovery tool supporting numerous hash and cipher types.

name: aircrack-ng
description: A complete suite of tools to assess WiFi network security.

name: reaver
description: A brute force attack tool against WPS (WiFi Protected Setup).

name: tcpdump
description: A powerful command-line packet analyzer for network traffic monitoring.

name: tshark
description: A network protocol analyzer that captures and displays packet details.

name: ngrep
description: A network packet analyzer that allows grep-like searching through network traffic.

name: arp-scan
description: A tool to discover and fingerprint IP hosts on the local network using ARP.

name: netdiscover
description: An active/passive ARP reconnaissance tool used to discover live hosts on a network.

name: dnsrecon
description: A DNS enumeration script that performs various DNS reconnaissance techniques.

name: dnsenum
description: A comprehensive DNS enumeration tool for gathering DNS information.

name: fierce
description: A domain scanner that attempts to locate non-contiguous IP space and hostnames.

name: volatility3
description: Advanced memory forensics framework for analyzing memory dumps to find malware, processes, and artifacts.

name: foremost
description: Data recovery and file carving tool to extract files from disk images and raw data.

name: fls
description: SleuthKit tool to list files and directories in disk images and file systems.

name: fsstat
description: SleuthKit tool to display file system details and statistics from disk images.

name: mmls
description: SleuthKit tool to display partition layouts and volume information from disk images.

name: autopsy
description: Digital forensics platform for analyzing disk images, memory dumps, and other evidence.

name: binwalk
description: Firmware analysis tool to extract and analyze embedded files and filesystems.

name: strings
description: Extract printable strings from binary files to find embedded text, URLs, and credentials.

name: dnsmap
description: A DNS network mapper that discovers subdomains by brute-forcing DNS queries using a wordlist.

name: lbd
description: Load Balancer Detector - A tool to detect if a given domain uses load balancing via multiple detection methods.

name: recon-ng
description: A full-featured Web Reconnaissance framework written in Python with independent modules and database interaction.

name: wfuzz
description: A web application fuzzer that can be used for finding resources not linked, brute forcing GET and POST parameters, and more.

name: magicrescue
description: A tool to recover files from a disk image or device by scanning for magic bytes and file signatures.

name: photorec
description: A powerful file recovery tool designed to recover lost files including videos, documents and archives from hard disks and CDRom.

name: scalpel
description: A fast file carver that reads a database of header and footer definitions and extracts matching files from a set of image files or raw device files.

name: scrounge-ntfs
description: A tool for recovering deleted files from NTFS filesystems by analyzing the Master File Table (MFT) and recovering deleted file records.

name: testdisk
description: A powerful free data recovery software designed to help recover lost partitions and/or make non-booting disks bootable again.

name: wafw00f
description: A tool to identify and fingerprint Web Application Firewall (WAF) products protecting a website.

name: wapiti
description: A web application vulnerability scanner that performs black-box scans to detect security vulnerabilities in web applications.

name: whatweb
description: A web scanner that identifies websites and their technologies including web servers, CMS, frameworks, and more.

name: sublist3r
description: A Python tool designed to enumerate subdomains of websites using OSINT techniques and passive reconnaissance.

name: subfinder
description: A subdomain discovery tool that discovers valid subdomains for websites using passive online sources.

name: httpx
description: A fast and multi-purpose HTTP toolkit that allows running multiple probes using the retryablehttp library.

name: blkcat
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that displays the contents of a data unit (block) from a disk image or device.

name: blkls
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that lists the unallocated blocks of a file system in a disk image.

name: blkstat
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that displays the statistics of a data unit (block) from a disk image.

name: ffind
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that finds the file name(s) that point to a given meta data structure.

name: hfind
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that looks up a hash value in a hash database to find the corresponding file name.

name: icat
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that displays the contents of a file based on its inode number.

name: ifind
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that finds the inode that has a given meta data address.

name: ils
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that lists the inode information of deleted files in a file system.

name: img_cat
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that displays the contents of a specific sector range in a disk image.

name: img_stat
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that displays the statistics of a disk image including size, type, and other metadata.

name: istat
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that displays the statistics of a specific inode in a file system.

name: jcat
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that displays the contents of a file based on its journal entry.

name: jls
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that lists the entries in a file system journal.

name: mactime
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that creates a timeline of file activity based on file system metadata.

name: mmcat
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that displays the contents of a specific data unit in a disk image.

name: mmstat
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that displays the statistics of a specific data unit in a disk image.

name: sigfind
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that searches for a binary signature at a given offset in a disk image.

name: sorter
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that sorts files by type based on their file signatures.

name: srch_strings
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that searches for strings in a disk image or file.

name: tsk_comparedir
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that compares two directories and reports differences.

name: tsk_gettimes
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that extracts and displays file system timestamps from a disk image.

name: tsk_loaddb
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that loads file system metadata into a database for analysis.

name: tsk_recover
description: A Sleuth Kit tool that recovers files from a disk image based on file system metadata.
